hanzi-su-wiki:
売

Значения

Продавать, передавать, изменять

Мнемоника

  • Сокращение. Снимать с денег покров 冖 пуская в оборот, чтобы те зажили бы собственной жизнью 儿 дали бы новые всходы 士, т.е. прибыль. Выставлять напоказ, хвастать так, чтобы у покупателей глаза из орбит лезли, продавать.

  • Человек продаёт что-то.

Варианты

賣, 卖
purpleculture_pinyin:
mài
Japanese variant of 卖
Японский вариант продажи

X		sell, enjoy a large sale
  • professional 士 merchant standing 儿 with his package 冖 of wares
 商 卸 販; 楽; 続 読

賣賣RS
卖卖		売sell, betray, show off
  • the professional 士 hits the money 貝 out of your pocket ⺲; one always feels a little betrayed
  • ⓢ modf. 賣 → 売: a merchant bars the way 士 in the wide 冖 market so you can't run 儿 away and have to buy something
  • ⓢ modf. 賣 → 卖: professional 士 boss 头 hitting money out of your pocket
売
heisig_constituent: sell, samurai, paper punch, Miss World, crown, human legs
heisig_story: A samurai, out of a job, is going door-to-door selling little windup crowns with human legs that run around on the floor looking like headless monarchs.
myStory:
net radical, но внизу

джентльмен закидывает сеть (в ней улов)
koohiiStory1: The samurai happened to find an extra large crown that he wore as a belt on his waist, just above his legs. I wonder if he will sell it to me?
koohiiStory2: A "samurai" will never sell his "crown" (king), even it meant having both his "human legs" chopped off!

売り出し(うりだし): (bargain) sale
売り出す(うりだす): to put on sale, to market, to become popular

前売り(まえうり): advance sale, booking
売上(うりあげ): amount sold, proceeds
売り切れ(うりきれ): sold out
売り切れる(うりきれる): be sold out
売れる(うれる): be sold
商売(しょうばい): trade, business, commerce, transaction, occupation
特売(とくばい): special sale

jp_readingExamples: 売る (う.る), 売れる (う.れる)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: There’s a samurai with (just) his forehead and legs. Everything in between is missing. What happened to everything in between? He was low on money, so he had to sell it all, leaving him with only the top and the bottom.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine this terrifying samurai. You have legs… okay, that’s normal. But, then you have just a giant forehead on the top of everything else, walking around. It's pretty scary that someone would sell such important parts of their body.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: If you see a samurai trying to sell all their body parts here's what you should say, "Bye (ばい)!" and just get the heck out of there. Actually, if anyone tries to sell you a body part you should probably say bye over and over until you can get away from them.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine saying, "Bye," loudly into the forehead of a samurai trying to sell you the rest of their face. If you say it loud enough it will distract them while you run away.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the samurai (士) with the net (㓁) is selling something

mài
яп. вм. 卖

売

Значения

Продавать, передавать, изменять

Мнемоника

  • Сокращение. Снимать с денег покров 冖 пуская в оборот, чтобы те зажили бы собственной жизнью 儿 дали бы новые всходы 士, т.е. прибыль. Выставлять напоказ, хвастать так, чтобы у покупателей глаза из орбит лезли, продавать.

  • Человек продаёт что-то.

Варианты

賣, 卖

Radicals: 士, 冖, 儿  (samurai, forehead, legs)
Meaning Mnemonic
There’s a samurai with (just) his forehead and legs. Everything in between is missing. What happened to everything in between? He was low on money, so he had to sell it all, leaving him with only the top and the bottom.
Imagine this terrifying samurai. You have legs… okay, that’s normal. But, then you have just a giant forehead on the top of everything else, walking around. It's pretty scary that someone would sell such important parts of their body.
Reading Mnemonic
If you see a samurai trying to sell all their body parts here's what you should say, "Bye (ばい)!" and just get the heck out of there. Actually, if anyone tries to sell you a body part you should probably say bye over and over until you can get away from them.
Imagine saying, "Bye," loudly into the forehead of a samurai trying to sell you the rest of their face. If you say it loud enough it will distract them while you run away.
